Summary: there are ufos in the mountians of ojai,rose valley and lockwood valley. there is vortexes witch they are atracted to. so they gather here to refuill
divs: Sighting Detailsi found a realy big orb on top of a mountian resting a week ago. went back 3 days latter it was gone i got 3 pictures of it befor it left it was realy big.i could not get to close to it becouse it put out a energy that i felt like i did not belong and if i went any closer i wold disapeir so when i went back its gone there wasa resado all around but dryed up in front of me. iv seen orbs fly above me a lot but never seen one on the ground.i am on meds so i dont see them anymore but i am still seeing them
